title: Tryng to recconect
body: Eh, this is whenever I am waiting in the queue for the start of the match and I come to tryng to recconect, of course, and bring me back to the lobby every time, also when I got a ban on the 5 game, when I was waiting in the queue, He moved out and continued to get punished, he left me another game and now he returns me to the lobby again, I tried to change the dmz server ip server that I found on yt, but I'm not that kind of router I can not change or anything, Solution?

replies.body: This sounds like a pretty unstable connection causing you to lose sync and get kicked out.  It's really important to fix this up, because even missing queue consistently can result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty.  I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this!  Let me know if you have any questions!
